name: Super Parkour
description:
This is a modded version of Cocos2d-JS game engine Parkour tutorial.

Original version is a very simple endless runner.

This version instead is a 2D platformer where you have to collect all the coins and be careful of your health.

Controls:

  • Dragging the player will appear an arrow, the more you drag the bigger it becomes. 
  • Releasing it the player will run or jump accordingly to the size of the arrow.
